OBJECTIVE 
I have more than 3.5 years with role .Net developer, I’m interested in learning new technologies, 
I’m building my skill to become fullstack developer Hence I like to learn new front end framework 
(React, VueJs). Besides, I’m able to communicate with client or foreign colleagues that help me to 
know new culture from them.!  I want to join young and active working environment. 
For me, I can not work without learning, good experiences, smile, relaxing…

test.
